wikipedia_page.main: Tony Jones (12 November 1937 – 1990) was an English footballer who played for Oxford United, Newport County and Witney Town. During his spell at Oxford, he played 319 league games, and he is eleventh highest in the overall list of appearances. Jones is also third in the all-time goalscoring list.
